comment:
* Class for exposing the native RenderScript rs_matrix2x2 type back to the Android system.
 *
 *

methods.name: public float[] getArray()
methods.comment:
* Return a reference to the internal array representing matrix
    * values. Modifying this array will also change the matrix
    *
    * @return internal array representing the matrix

methods.name: public float get(int x, int y)
methods.comment:
* Returns the value for a given row and column
    *
    * @param x column of the value to return
    * @param y row of the value to return
    *
    * @return value in the yth row and xth column

methods.name: public void set(int x, int y, float v)
methods.comment:
* Sets the value for a given row and column
    *
    * @param x column of the value to set
    * @param y row of the value to set

methods.name: public void loadIdentity()
methods.comment: * Sets the matrix values to identity

methods.name: public void load(Matrix2f src)
methods.comment:
* Sets the values of the matrix to those of the parameter
    *
    * @param src matrix to load the values from

methods.name: public void loadRotate(float rot)
methods.comment:
* Sets current values to be a rotation matrix of given angle
    *
    * @param rot rotation angle

methods.name: public void loadScale(float x, float y)
methods.comment:
* Sets current values to be a scale matrix of given dimensions
    *
    * @param x scale component x
    * @param y scale component y

methods.name: public void loadMultiply(Matrix2f lhs, Matrix2f rhs)
methods.comment:
* Sets current values to be the result of multiplying two given
    * matrices
    *
    * @param lhs left hand side matrix
    * @param rhs right hand side matrix

methods.name: public void multiply(Matrix2f rhs)
methods.comment:
* Post-multiplies the current matrix by a given parameter
    *
    * @param rhs right hand side to multiply by

methods.name: public void rotate(float rot)
methods.comment:
* Modifies the current matrix by post-multiplying it with a
    * rotation matrix of given angle
    *
    * @param rot angle of rotation

methods.name: public void scale(float x, float y)
methods.comment:
* Modifies the current matrix by post-multiplying it with a
    * scale matrix of given dimensions
    *
    * @param x scale component x
    * @param y scale component y

methods.name: public void transpose()
methods.comment: * Sets the current matrix to its transpose

methodNames: public float get(int x, int y)
public void set(int x, int y, float v)
public void loadScale(float x, float y)
public void loadMultiply(Matrix2f lhs, Matrix2f rhs)
public void scale(float x, float y)
